context.p: On the Delete marketplace page, you can remove a marketplace from your platform.
If you delete a marketplace with activated services, these services are automatically deactivated. Customers can no longer subscribe to them. Existing subscriptions, however, are not affected.

step.cmd: From the Marketplace list, select the marketplace to be deleted.
step.info: The list contains all marketplaces that exist on your platform.

step.cmd: Click Delete and confirm the deletion.
